channel.title: Server Error {pi}
channel.description: what my server does. after being logged in with players it crashes after a while using erased pkz base coded alot randomly does cmd nulls, posted picture below. thanks.

item.title: Server Error {pi}
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The specific error in question (the one in the picture) is because the server cannot find a file named “stackable.dat” in .\Data\data
.\ represents going back 1 folder
So in your data folder, you should have another data folder, and in that there should be a stackable.dat file

Read full topic

item.title: Server Error {pi}

item.description:
@I_Smoke_Kush wrote:

nope everything is in the right place something is wrong. i got more.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Error {pi}
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

The files, stackable and notes, are missing. Just need to make them or if you do have them but in a different directory, either put them into the directory it’s trying to go to or just change the directory where those files are.

Read full topic
